mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO `kancolle`.`t_ship_graph` (`ID`, `SORTNO`, `FILENAME`, `VERSION`, `BOKO_N`, `BOKO_D`, `KAISYU_N`, `KAISYU_D`, `KAIZO_N`, `KAIZO_D`, `MAP_N`, `MAP_D`, `ENSYUF_N`, `ENSYUF_D`, `ENSYUE_N`, `BATTLE_N`, `BATTLE_D`, `WEDA`, `WEDB`) VALUES (#{ID}, #{SORTNO},#{FILENAME},#{VERSION, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{BOKO_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler},#{BOKO_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{KAISYU_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{KAISYU_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{KAIZO_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{KAIZO_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{MAP_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{MAP_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{ENSYUF_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{ENSYUF_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{ENSYUE_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{BATTLE_N, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{BATTLE_D, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{WEDA, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler}, #{WEDB, typeHandler=JsonArrayHandler});
